com.sri.ai.grinder.helper

Class AssignmentsSamplingIterator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sri.ai.util.collect.EZIterator<Assignment>
      • com.sri.ai.grinder.helper.AssignmentsSamplingIterator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Iterator<Assignment>

    public class AssignmentsSamplingIterator
extends EZIterator<Assignment>
    An assignments iterator that samples over the space of possible assignments. The iterator never ends unless the set to sample from is empty. To limit to a number of samples, use the NIterator adaptor. Currently, only a single variable is supported and an exception is thrown if more than one is received.
    Author:
    oreilly
